attributes.action: Denounce the shambolic elections in Nigeria (April 2007)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some polling stations did not open on time. Some did not open at all. People did not get to vote. Some people voted numerous times. Ballot papers went missing. Attacks on voters were rife. Over 200 deaths occurred during this vote. Goodness knows how the votes were actually counted. The Nigerian election hardly smacks of legitimacy. It is for Number 10 to denounce this rigged election and call for another one to be held under democratic, safe conditions.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
